parameters.functionCode: const items=$input.all();for(const i of items){const kj=i.json.kj_insights||{};i.json.video_config={prompt:i.json.base_prompt+' theme:'+kj.narrative_theme,style_id:'LTX-'+Date.now(),frames:120,fps:24};i.json.binary_noise=Buffer.from(Math.random().toString()).toString('base64').substr(0,16);}return items;
